examples.example: 每次去饭店吃饭，都能感受到热情的服务和温馨的氛围。

translate.english: Every time I go to the restaurant to eat, I can feel the enthusiastic service and warm atmosphere.

examples.example: 我们一家人在饭店里享受了一顿美味丰盛又开心快乐的晚餐。

translate.english: Our family enjoyed a delicious, sumptuous and happy dinner in the restaurant.

examples.example: 周末我们全家去饭店聚餐，度过了一段愉快的时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, our whole family went to the restaurant to have a meal together and had a pleasant time.
